Verses: 1 karththar Enakkuch Solliyabadi Naam Thirumbi, Sivandha Samuththiraththirkup Pogira Vazhiyaai Vanaandharaththirkup Pirayaanampanni, Anega Naal Seyeer Naattaich Sutriththirindhom.
2 appozhudhu Karththar Ennai Nokki:
3 neengal Indha Malainaattaich Sutrith Thirindhadhu Podhum; Vadakke Thirumbungal.

4 janangalukku Nee Kattalaiyidavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Seyeerile Kudiyirukkira Esaavin Puththiraraana Ungal Sagodhararin Ellaiyaik Kadakkappogireergal; Avargal Ungalukkup Bayappaduvaargal; Neengalo Migavum Echcharikkaiyaayirungal;
5 avargalode Porchcheyyavendaam; Avargal Dhesaththile Oru Adi Nilamum Ungalukkuk Koden; Seyeer Malainaattai Esaavukkuch Sudhandharamaagak Koduththirukkiren.
6 bojanapadhaarththangalai Avargal Kaiyile Panaththirku Vaangip Pusiththu, Thanneeraiyum Avargal Kaiyile Panaththirku Vaangik Kudiyungal.

7 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Un Kaikkiriyaigalilellaam Unnai Aaseervadhiththu Varugiraar; Indhap Periya Vanaandharavazhiyaai Nee Nadandhuvarugiradhai Arivaar; Indha Naarpadhu Varushamum Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unnode Irundhaar; Unakku Ondrum Kuraivupadavillai Endru Sol Endraar.

8 appadiye Naam Seyeerile Kudiyirukkira Nammudaiya Sagodhararaagiya Esaavin Puththirarai Vittup Purappattu, Andharaveli Vazhiyaai Elaadhmelum, Esiyonkepermelum Poi, Thirumbikkondu, Movaap Vanaandharavazhiyaai Vandhom.

9 appozhudhu Karththar Ennai Nokki: Nee Movaabai Varuththappaduththaamalum, Avargalode Porseyyaamalum Iru; Avargal Dhesaththil Unakku Ondrum Sudhandharamaagak Koden; Aar Ennum Pattanaththin Seemaiyai Lodh Puththirarukkuch Sudhandharamaagak Koduththen.
10 thiralaanavargalum Enaakkiyaraippola Nediyavargalumaana Balaththa Janangalaagiya Emiyar Adhil Munne Kudiyirundhaargal.
11 avargalum Enaakkiyaraiyoththa Raatchadhar Endru Ennappattaargal; Movaabiyaro Avargalai Emiyar Endru Sollugiraargal.

12 oriyarum Seyeeril Munne Kudiyirundhaargal; Karththar Thangalukkuch Sudhandharamaagak Koduththa Dhesaththaarai Isravel Thuraththinadhupola, Esaavin Puththirar Andha Oriyaraith Thuraththi, Avargalaith Thangal Mugaththirku Munbaaga Azhiththu, Avargal Irundha Sthaanaththil Kudiyerinaargal.
13 neengal Ezhundhu, Seredh Aatraik Kadandhupongal Endru Sonnaar; Appadiye Seredh Aatraik Kadandhom.

14 yuththa Manidharaana Andhach Sandhadhiyellaam Karththar Thangalukku Aanaiyittabadiye Paalayaththin Naduvilirundhu Maandupoga, Naam Kaadhesparneyaavai Vittuppurappattadhu Mudhalkondu, Seredh Aatraik Kadakkumattum, Sendra Kaalam Muppaththettu Varushamaayitru.
15 avargal Paalayaththin Naduvilirundhu Maandu Ozhiyumattum Karththarin Kai Avargalai Nirmoolamaakkumbadikku Avargalukku Virodhamaayirundhadhu.
16 yuththamanidhar Ellaarum Janaththin Naduvilirundhu Seththuth Theerndhapinbu,
17 karththar Ennai Nokki:
18 nee Aar Pattanam Irukkira Movaabin Ellaiyai Indraikkuk Kadandhu,

19 ammon Puththirarukku Edhiraagach Serappogiraai; Nee Avargalai Varuththappaduththavum Avargalode Por Seyyavum Vendaam; Ammon Puththirarin Dhesaththil Ondrum Unakkuch Sudhandharamaagak Koden; Adhai Lodh Puththirarukkuch Sudhandharamaagak Koduththirukkiren.
20 adhuvum Raatchadharudaiya Dhesamaaga Ennappattadhu; Murkaalaththil Raatchadhar Adhile Kudiyirundhaargal, Ammoniyar Avargalaich Chamsoomiyar Endru Sollugiraargal.

21 avargal Thiralaanavargalum Enaakkiyaraippola Nediyavargalumaana Balaththa Janangalaayirundhaargal; Karththaro Seyeeril Kudiyirundha Esaavin Puththirarukku Munbaaga Oriyarai Azhikka, Avargal Andha Janangalaith Thuraththivittu, Avargal Irundha Sthaanaththil Innaalvaraikkum Kudiyirukkiradhupolavum,
22 kapdhorilirundhu Purappatta Kapdhoriyar Aasereem Thodangi Aasaamattum Kudiyirundha Aaviyarai Azhiththu, Avargal Irundha Sthaanaththile Kudiyerinadhupolavum,
23 karththar Avargalai Ivargalukku Munbaaga Azhiyappanna, Ivargal Avargalaith Thuraththivittu, Avargal Irundha Sthaanaththile Kudiyerinaargal.

24 neengal Ezhundhu Pirayaanampanni, Arnon Aatraik Kadandhupongal; Esponin Raajaavaagiya Seekon Ennum Emoriyanaiyum Avan Dhesaththaiyum Un Kaiyile Oppukkoduththen; Idhumudhal Adhaich Sudhandhariththukkollumbadi Avanode Yuththanjey.
25 vaanaththinkeezh Engumulla Janangal Unnaale Thigilum Bayamum Adaiyumbadi Seyya Indru Naan Thodanguven; Avargal Un Keerththiyaik Kettu, Unnimiththam Nadungi, Vedhanaippaduvaargal Endraar.
26 appozhudhu Naan Kedhemodh Vanaandharaththilirundhu Esponin Raajaavaagiya Seekonidaththil, Samaadhaana Vaarththaigalaich Sollumbadi Sthaanaapadhigalai Anuppi:
27 naan Ummudaiya Dhesaththaik Kadandhupogumbadi Uththaravukodum; Valadhupuram Idadhupuram Saayaamal Perumpaadhai Vazhiyaai Nadappen.

28 seyeeril Kudiyirukkira Esaavin Puththirarum, Aar Pattanaththil Kudiyirukkira Movaabiyarum Enakkuch Seydhadhupola, Neerum Naan Yordhaanaik Kadandhu, Engal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Engalukkuk Kodukkira Dhesaththil Serumattum,
29 enakkup Pusikka Aagaaraththaiyum Kudikkath Thanneeraiyum Kirayaththukkuth Thaarum; Naan Kaalnadaiyaaik Kadandhupogamaaththiram Uththaravukodum Endru Solli Anuppinen.
31 appozhudhu Karththar Ennai Nokki: Idho, Seekonaiyum Avan Dhesaththaiyum Unakku Oppukkodukkappogiren; Idhumudhal Avan Dhesaththai Vasappaduththi, Sudhandhariththukkol Endraar.
32 seekon Thannudaiya Ellaa Janangalodungooda Nammode Yuththampannap Purappattu, Yaakaasile Vandhaan.
33 avanai Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Namakku Oppukkoduththaar; Naam Avanaiyum Avan Kumaararaiyum Avanudaiya Sagala Janangalaiyum Muriya Adiththu,
34 akkaalaththil Avan Pattanangalaiyellaam Pidiththu, Sagala Pattanangalilum Irundha Sthiree Purusharaiyum, Pillaigalaiyum, Oruvaraiyum Meedhiyaaga Vaikkaamal Sangaarampanninom.
35 mirugajeevangalaiyum Naam Pidiththa Pattanangalaiyumaaththiram Namakkendru Vaiththukkondom.

36 arnon Aatrangaraiyil Irukkira Aaroverum Aatrandaiyil Irukkira Pattanamum Thodangi, Keeleyaadhvaraikkum Namakku Edhirththunirkaththakka Aranippaana Pattanam Irundhadhillai, Ellaavatraiyum Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Namakku Oppukkoduththaar.

37 ammon Puththirarudaiya Dhesaththaiyum, Yaabok Aatrangaraiyilulla Idangalaiyum, Malaigalilulla Pattanangalaiyum, Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Namakku Vilakkina Matra Idangalaiyum Seraamal Vilagipponaai.
